DOC.brief_summary: Taxotere approve FDA consider standard treatment patient lung cancer fail prior platinum-containing regimen . The main purpose research study determine Aptosyn , give combination Taxotere , result prolong survival compare Taxotere alone . This study also help determine tumor response rate , safety profile Aptosyn combination Taxotere . This study complete publication pending .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study Efficacy Taxotere/Aptosyn Versus Taxotere/Placebo Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Patients
